@description.name: @description
@description.body: Utility functions for working with nodes. These methods allow reference to a node by either the object itself or the object's node id.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a node object given its node id.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node to have its opened/closed state toggled.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.).
@param.description:
The node to have its opened/closed state toggled.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.).

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Object}
   If the nodeReference is a node object itself, that same node object
   is returned (identity).  Otherwise, the node object is looked up
   using the specified node id.
@return.description:
If the nodeReference is a node object itself, that same node object
   is returned (identity).  Otherwise, the node object is looked up
   using the specified node id.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggle the opened state of the node: if the node is opened, close it; if it is closed, open it.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node to have its opened/closed state toggled.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node to have its opened/closed state toggled.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@param.description:
The node for which attributes are being set.  The node can be

   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@param.name: @param

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the icon for a node when in its unselected (normal) state.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node for which the icon is being set.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node for which the icon is being set.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
path {String}
   The path to the icon to be used when the node is not selected
@param.description: The path to the icon to be used when the node is not selected

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the icon for a node when in its unselected (normal) state.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node for which the icon is being retrieved.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node for which the icon is being retrieved.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@return.name: @return
@return.description:
The path to the icon to be used when the node is not selected, if a
   path has been previously provided (i.e. not using the default icon).

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Set the icon for a node when in its selected state.

NOTE: As of 13 Mar 2009, this feature is disabled by default, by virtue of the fact that the tree's "alwaysUpdateCells" property has a setting of 'false' now instead of 'true'. Setting this property to true allows the icon to change upon selection, but causes problems such as single clicks not always selecting a row, and, in IE, double click operations failing completely. (For more information, see bugs 605 and 2021.) To re-enable the option to have an unique icon that is displayed when the node is selected, issue tree.setAlwaysUpdateCells(true);

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node for which the icon is being set.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node for which the icon is being set.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
path {String}
   The path to the icon to be used when the node is selected
@param.description: The path to the icon to be used when the node is selected

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the icon for a node when in its selected state.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node for which the icon is being retrieved.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node for which the icon is being retrieved.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@return.name: @return
@return.description:
The path to the icon to be used when the node is selected, if a path
   has been previously provided (i.e. not using the default icon).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the cell style for a node

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node for which the cell style is being set.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node for which the cell style is being set.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
style {String}
   The CSS style to be applied for the tree column cell for this node,
   if a style has been previously provided (i.e. not using the default
   style).
@param.description:
The CSS style to be applied for the tree column cell for this node,
   if a style has been previously provided (i.e. not using the default
   style).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the cell style for a node

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
nodeReference {Object | Integer}
   The node for which the cell style is being retrieved.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)
@param.description:
The node for which the cell style is being retrieved.  The node can be
   represented either by the node object, or the node id (as would have
   been returned by addBranch(), addLeaf(), etc.)

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{String}
   The CSS style being applied for the tree column cell for this node.
@return.description: The CSS style being applied for the tree column cell for this node.
